price: 9. Nous pouvions nous y installer pour écouter (les secrets célestes), or quiconque prête l’oreille aujourd’hui verra fondre sur lui un météore à l’affût.
arabic: وَأَنَّا كُنَّا نَقۡعُدُ مِنۡهَا مَقَٰعِدَ لِلسَّمۡعِۖ فَمَن يَسۡتَمِعِ ٱلۡأٓنَ يَجِدۡ لَهُۥ شِهَابٗا رَّصَدٗا

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: wa-annā kunnā naqʿudu min'hā maqāʿida lilssamʿi faman yastamiʿi al-āna yajid lahu shihāban raṣadan
